title: Highest Internet Usage
description: In 2023, Bahrain achieved 100% internet usage among its population, with both male and female individuals having full access to the internet.

title: Lowest Fertilizer Consumption
description: In 2022, Bahrain's fertilizer consumption was only 0.06% of its fertilizer production, indicating minimal usage.

title: Lowest Renewable Freshwater Resources
description: As of 2021, Bahrain had only 0.004 billion cubic meters of renewable internal freshwater resources, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Intentional Homicide Rate
description: In 2021, Bahrain had an intentional homicide rate of 0.068 per 100,000 people, one of the lowest globally.

title: Highest Newborn Tetanus Protection
description: In 2023, 100% of newborns in Bahrain were protected against tetanus, showcasing excellent healthcare coverage.
